title: Please help me identify the name of this font
author: YASSA2067

comments.content: It could be an emboldened/expanded **[Magnesium MVB](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405004259/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Magnesium%20MVB%20Std%20-%20Regular&fid=d71d253c00373f2b2b0600418ff14e07&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=ROMIKA&fit=1)** by Mark van Bronkhorst [1992, available from Adobe, MVB]
